hero.title: Empowering Farmers Through Digital Transparency
hero.description: Krishi Setu bridges the gap between farmers and buyers, eliminating middlemen exploitation and ensuring fair prices through a transparent digital marketplace

hero_stats.stat1_label: Current farmer earnings vs consumer price

features.title: Breaking the Chains of Agricultural Exploitation
features.subtitle: Krishi Setu provides a comprehensive solution to the challenges faced by Indian farmers
features.feature1_desc: Connect directly with verified buyers, eliminating middlemen and ensuring better prices for your produce
features.feature2_desc: All transactions happen through government-verified tenders, ensuring fairness and transparency
features.feature3_desc: Safe wallet system where payments are released only after successful product delivery
features.feature4_desc: Rent out your farming equipment to earn extra income when not in use
features.feature5_desc: Transparent bidding system ensures farmers get the best market price for their produce
features.feature6_desc: User-friendly interface designed for farmers with limited digital knowledge

marketplace.title: Digital Marketplace
marketplace.tenderNote: All tenders are verified by government authorities. Bidding is supervised and transparent. Highest bid wins the tender.
marketplace.enterBidAmount: Enter your bid amount higher than the current highest bid to win
marketplace.onlyBuyersCanCreate: Only registered buyers can create tenders
marketplace.loginToContinue: Please login as a buyer to continue
marketplace.buyerNote: Create a tender to purchase crops directly from farmers. Set your maximum price and requirements. Farmers will compete to offer the best price.
marketplace.cropPosted: Your crop has been posted successfully!
marketplace.tenderPosted: Your tender has been posted successfully!
marketplace.pleaseLogin: Please login to post your crop
marketplace.deliveryLocationPlaceholder: Where should the crop be delivered?
marketplace.additionalDesc: Specify any additional requirements (moisture content, packaging, etc.)

equipment.title: Equipment Rental Platform
equipment.subtitle: Rent farming equipment from fellow farmers and earn extra income by renting out your machinery
equipment.verifiedDesc: All equipment is verified before listing
equipment.secureDesc: Payment held until equipment is delivered

government.title: Government Portal
government.subtitle: Complete transparency in agricultural transactions with government oversight
government.step1_desc: Farmers register with Aadhaar and land records
government.step2_desc: Government officials verify crop quality and quantity
government.step3_desc: Verified crops are listed as government tenders
government.step4_desc: All bids are monitored to ensure fair pricing
government.datadriven_desc: Real-time data helps in better policy making
government.transparency_desc: Every transaction is recorded and traceable
